actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Forests and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Forests and Public Land Management

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of lands to certain individuals in Butte County, California.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey without consideration certain lands in Butte County, California, adjacent to the Plumas National Forest to eligible persons who make their claims within two years. Requires the Secretary to: (1) make the necessary surveys and property line markings; and (2) submit a copy of each deed to the Secretary of the Interior. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of lands to certain individuals in Butte County, California.
